data.lyric:
[ti:Make It Sweet]
[ar:Old Dominion]
[al:Make It Sweet]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Make It Sweet - Old Dominion
[00:03.53]Lyrics by：Trevor Rosen/Matthew Ramsey/Brad Tursi/Geoff Sprung/Whit Sellers/Shane McAnally
[00:07.06]Composed by：Trevor Rosen/Matthew Ramsey/Brad Tursi/Geoff Sprung/Whit Sellers/Shane McAnally
[00:10.59]I know it's a drag I know it's a grind
[00:13.29]I know that a dollar ain't worth a dime
[00:16.62]Trying to keep up with the Joneses
[00:18.61]At the end of the block
[00:21.38]I know you get tired I know you get down
[00:23.86]I know you get sick of this soul sucking town
[00:27.07]Let's make a little lemonade if lemons is all we got
[00:32.14]'Cause I'm stuck on you you're stuck on me
[00:35.11]I never gotta wonder where my honey be
[00:37.65]I ain't saving all my sugar for a Saturday night
[00:40.51]Seven days a week I got an appetite
[00:43.06]Sunsets like a tangerine let's find a road we've never seen
[00:48.28]Don't waste another mile or a minute not kissing me
[00:52.27]Life is short make it sweet
[01:04.18]Open sky glimpse of heaven take the top off the CJ-7
[01:09.41]Let that surfside San Anne wind mess up your hair
[01:14.69]And let that windshield frame the ocean
[01:17.49]Radio keep coast to coasting
[01:20.37]If we don't get where we're going baby I don't care
[01:24.01]I'm already there
[01:25.62]'Cause I'm stuck on you you're stuck on me
[01:28.51]I never gotta wonder where my honey be
[01:30.97]I ain't saving all my sugar for a Saturday night
[01:33.78]Seven days a week I got an appetite
[01:36.56]Sunsets like a tangerine let's find a road we've never seen
[01:41.73]Don't waste another mile or a minute not kissing me
[01:45.41]Life is short make it sweet
[01:52.81]Days will be long but the years will fly right by
[01:58.43]We'll never be as young as we are tonight
[02:01.07]Baby ain't that right yeah
[02:13.94]'Cause I'm stuck on you you're stuck on me
[02:16.40]I never gotta wonder where my honey be
[02:19.05]I ain't saving all my sugar for a Saturday night
[02:21.88]Seven days a week I got an appetite
[02:24.68]Sunsets like a tangerine let's find a road we've never seen
[02:29.72]Don't waste another mile or a minute not kissing me
[02:33.54]Life is short make it sweet
[02:38.99]Life is short make it sweet
[02:44.11]Oh yeah yeah yeyeah
data.trans:
[ti:Make It Sweet]
[ar:Old Dominion]
[al:Make It Sweet]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:03.53]//
[00:07.06]//
[00:10.59]我知道 生活充满了疲惫和苦难
[00:13.29]我知道 金钱本就毫无价值
[00:16.62]要努力跟上别人的步伐
[00:18.61]即使到了走投无路的时候
[00:21.38]我知道你此刻筋疲力尽 失去信心
[00:23.86]我知道你厌倦了都市的冷漠无情
[00:27.07]即使剩下最后一点希望 也要乐观面对
[00:32.14]因为我们同舟共济 唇齿相依
[00:35.11]我不会怀疑你 跟踪你
[00:37.65]我也不会吝啬于分享自己的快乐
[00:40.51]一周七天 我总能拥有好心情
[00:43.06]夕阳似火 一起去探索未知的世界吧
[00:48.28]不要再浪费时间了 快吻我
[00:52.27]人生苦短 及时行乐
[01:04.18]天高气朗 仿佛可以看到天堂 放下吉普CJ7的敞篷
[01:09.41]让沙漠的干热风吹乱你的秀发
[01:14.69]透过挡风玻璃看到一小片海洋
[01:17.49]开着收音机 从东海岸一直到西海岸
[01:20.37]即使没有到达目的地也没关系
[01:24.01]我心已至
[01:25.62]因为我们同舟共济 唇齿相依
[01:28.51]我不会怀疑你 跟踪你
[01:30.97]我也不会吝啬于分享自己的快乐
[01:33.78]一周七天 我总能拥有好心情
[01:36.56]夕阳似火 一起去探索未知的世界吧
[01:41.73]不要再浪费时间了 快吻我
[01:45.41]人生苦短 及时行乐
[01:52.81]时间看似漫长 实则稍纵即逝
[01:58.43]今夜的美好让我们重回青春
[02:01.07]宝贝 这感觉是不是很好
[02:13.94]因为我们同舟共济 唇齿相依
[02:16.40]我不会怀疑你 跟踪你
[02:19.05]我也不会吝啬于分享自己的快乐
[02:21.88]一周七天 我总能拥有好心情
[02:24.68]夕阳似火 一起去探索未知的世界吧
[02:29.72]不要再浪费时间了 快吻我
[02:33.54]人生苦短 及时行乐
[02:38.99]人生苦短 及时行乐
[02:44.11]//
